alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, east central Aiken and northwestern Orangeburg Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williston, or 11 miles north of Barnwell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williston, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Springfield, Salley, Neeses, Norway, Elko and Livingston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg
